articles.title: American arrested at airport for cracking bomb joke - The Star Online
articles.description: An American was arrested in Tuguegarao for making a bomb joke, according to a Facebook post by the Cagayan provincial government.
articles.content:
MANILA (Philippine Daily Inquirer/ANN): An American man was arrested in Tuguegarao on Friday (Nov 5) for making a bomb joke, according to a Facebook post by the Cagayan provincial government.

articles.title: Newark is named America's WORST airport for delayed arrivals - with 25 percent of all flights tardy - Daily Mail
articles.description: Newark Liberty Airport in nearby Northern New Jersey was named the worst airport for delays, with nearly 25 percent of all flights arriving tardy.
articles.content:
A new study reveals which airports in America have the most delayed arrivals - and it's bad news for anyone trying to get to the New York-area by plane.
